articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Speaker of National Assembly of Sudan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Speaker of National Assembly of Sudan
Khartoum, October 24 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on an official goodwill visit to Sudan, met and had a talk with the speaker of the National Assembly of Sudan at the building of the National Assembly on Oct. 24.
					 The speaker of the National Assembly of Sudan said that he was paying deep attention to the fact that the Korean people were registering many successes in their efforts for building an economic power under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. He sent warm congratulations to the people of the DPRK.
					
					 That day he gave a reception in honor of Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: DPRK Will Mercilessly Shatter U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
DPRK Will Mercilessly Shatter U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Campaign
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is going mad in its campaign to hurt the dignity of the DPRK and bring down its socialist system by fabricating the non-existent "human rights issue" as its moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK over its nuclear issue prove unsuccessful.
					 The U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK has reached a graver phase with the approach of the end of October before the UN General Assembly.
					
					 As regards the prevailing situation, the DPRK National Defence Commission on Saturday issued a statement clarifying its principled stand internally and externally upon the authorization.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 First, Now that the U.S. "human rights" offensive against the DPRK has reached an extreme phase, the DPRK formally notifies the U.S. that the DPRK will settle accounts with those related to the offensive without the slightest clemency  and by every possible means and methods generation after generation.
					
					 The DPRK's society is the one centered on man as it values human beings as dearest. Accordingly, it regards it as the core of politics and its inviolable state policy to guarantee all rights of human beings at the highest level.
					
					 Probably, the successive U.S. presidents and other politicians may not understand there is such ideal society on our planet no matter how fervently one explains them.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is incapable of protecting the human rights of black men though it has black president. It is the worst tundra of human rights in the world where one percent of its population deprives its 99 percent of everything and these poorest people are more dead than alive as modern-day slaves. This being a hard fact, it is pitiful for the U.S. to dare talk about the genuine human rights in the DPRK.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the DPRK courteously requests Obama, Kerry and other politicians of the U.S. to bring even their followers to the DPRK so that they may see for themselves and learn what the genuine human rights are and what the man-centred society is as they are becoming so vocal about its "human rights issue" after faking it up. 
					
					 But this advice does not mean that the DPRK tolerates the "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. against it.
					
					 Not content with making the Korean people bear towering grudge, the U.S. has resorted to an unprecedented "human rights" racket. It will have to pay dearly for this generation after generation.
					
					 Second, Now that the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is leading to a vicious plot to bring down the dignified social system in the DPRK, it declares its new tough counter-action of its own style to frustrate the campaign of the U.S. and its allied forces.
					
					 The "human rights" campaign of the U.S. is another version of the most undisguised act of aggression against the DPRK's sovereignty and rights.
					
					 To cope with this, the DPRK, too, decided to launch a new tough counter-action of its own style to blow up the stronghold of the violators of "human rights."
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK had already declared before the world that an operational plan for striking all the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the Pacific targeting the DPRK and the main cities of the U.S. mainland where war maniacs are stationed was ratified.
					
					 The DPRK never hides the fact that the declaration of the most powerful new counter-action of its own style is based on a powerful nuclear force built in every way and various ultramodern striking means deployed in the ground, sea, underwater and air.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK's declaration of a powerful counter-action will be put into practice to blow up the citadel of the U.S. now that its "human rights" campaign to infringe upon the sovereignty and rights of the DPRK has gone beyond its tolerance limit. 
					
					 Third, The army and people of the DPRK call upon the world to thoroughly shatter the sinister cooperation for aggression sought by the U.S. and its followers under the pretext of the "human rights issue" through anti-U.S. cooperation based on justice and truth.
					
					 The anti-U.S. cooperation urged by the DPRK is cooperation of justice which all countries regarding sovereignty as life and soul and all peace-loving people should effect to dismember the U.S. imperialists in all parts of the world.
					
					 The DPRK will together all countries aspiring after justice and truth valiantly wage a just struggle against the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy.
					
					 The anti-U.S. cooperation called for by the DPRK will lead to a decisive battle through which human beings will kill beasts and justice will prevail over injustice and truth over lies.
					
					 The nuclear forces of the DPRK and political and military deterrence including them will demonstrate unimaginably tremendous might in effecting worldwide anti-U.S. cooperation.
					
					 The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is bound to go bankrupt as it is faked up by those fanatics whose days are numbered, without elementary understanding of their rival and it is based on the brigandish and self-opinionated theory of hostility.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government economic delegation led by Ri Myong San, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, left here on Saturday to attend the 9th meeting of the inter-governmental committee for economic, scientific and technological cooperation between the DPRK and Vietnam to be held in Vietnam and the 3rd meeting of the inter-governmental joint committee for economic, trade, scientific and technological cooperation between the DPRK and Laos to be held in Laos.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Congratulate Teachers of Kim Chaek University of Technology on Moving to New Flats
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Congratulate Teachers of Kim Chaek University of Technology on Moving to New Flats
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party and state on Saturday visited families of teachers and researchers who moved to new flats of the apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					 They included Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and other senior officials of the party and state and officials in the field of education and in Pyongyang.
					
					 They congratulated the teachers and researchers who received greatest preferential treatment under the loving care of the party, and handed over them household articles as souvenirs.
					
					 Listening to what the teachers and researchers said in excitement, they realized once again the warm loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for educators as they devote their all to educating talents of the country.
					
					 Teachers and researchers said they are the happiest people as they lead a worthwhile life under the loving care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They extended warm thanks to him who put forward educators as genuine patriots and revolutionaries and bestow upon them all glory and happiness.
					
					 The senior officials asked the teachers and researchers of the university to bring up more talents who would shoulder upon the future of the great Paektusan nation by taking the lead in bringing about a drastic turn in education in the new century and reliably guarantee the final victory of building a thriving nation by pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.

articles.title: Software Contest and Exhibition in DPRK
articles.content:
Software Contest and Exhibition in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The 25th National Software Contest and Exhibition began at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here on Tuesday.
					 On display there are more than 1 200 application programs, classified into 17 sections. And there are such contests as for English-Korean translation program, sport game simulation program and CAD program.
					
					 What draw visitors' interest in particular among them are process control programs conducive to the updating at factories and programs for sports activities.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pyongyang Information Technology Bureau presented 10 programs, including software for viewing on a smart phone news app as well as video clips.
					
					 An Tae Ryong, a teacher of College of Computer Science under Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that more than 120 programs displayed by the college are winning popularity among the visitors, adding the software contest and exhibition offer an good opportunity for scientists and technicians in IT field to strengthen academic exchanges and acquire new technologies.
					
					 The exhibition will last till October 28.

articles.title: Mirim Riding Club Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Mirim Riding Club Draws Many Visitors
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- It is one year since the Mirim Riding Club was successfully built in Mirim Area of Pyongyang.
					 Since the completion of the combined modern riding service centre having all conditions and circumstances necessary for riding exercises and education, it has been visited by at least 185 000 people from all walks life, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreigners. They had a good rest, riding horses. 
					
					 After passing through the gatepost, they first enter the room for the education in the revolutionary history where photos of the peerless great men and historic relics associated with their leadership are on display.
					
					 Buildings and facilities of peculiar style have a dramatic harmony with natural and modern scenic beauty so visitors feel as if they were in great nature.
					
					 The room for dissemination of riding knowledge, indoor riding-drill ground, recovery centre, veterinary hospital and breeding research institute the outer walls of which were peculiarly decorated with logs make the visitors feel as if they were in a forest village.
					
					 The visitors enjoying horse-riding, wearing riding caps and fatigues provided by Marshal Kim Jong Un, add to the spectacular scenery of the club.
					
					 Many compatriots and foreign guests, spending a pleasant time at the club, speak highly of the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK which provides its people with a highly civilized life.

articles.title: DPRK Makes Progress in Economy
articles.content:
DPRK Makes Progress in Economy
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made progress in the economic construction.
					 The modern Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter took its shape in the Unjong science area while the apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology were built on the scenic bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, big strides have been made in the country's major vast projects such as construction of power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and stockbreeding base in Sepho tableland and a project for expanding the Kosan Fruit Farm.
					
					 Members of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians, active in different parts of the country, smoothly settled many knotty sci-tech problems arising in practice.
					
					 Also, good results were reported from power industry and railway transport. This month the electricity output in the thermal power field of the country has grown up 2.7 times when compared with the last year's same period, and the railway workers overfulfilled their September assignments.
					
					 Many industrial establishments have already carried out their yearly plans.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Authorities to Check Leaflet Scattering Operation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Authorities to Check Leaflet Scattering Operation
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Human scum in south Korea are mulling conducting an anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation on Saturday again. In this regard south Korean civic and public organizations expressed their firm stand to check the leaflet scattering operation if the authorities refuse to take a measure against it. The opposition parties are strongly demanding the authorities hold in check the leaflet scattering operation.
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary says the leaflet scattering operation is recognized as a war action in the light of international law. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 If the leaflet scattering operation is conducted, it is bound to be followed by a combat to foil it. The repetition of such actions is bound to lead to an all-out war. The scattering of a piece of conspiratorial leaflet may spark off an all-out war. 
					
					 That is why the DPRK admonished the south Korean authorities enough to be aware of the consequences to be entailed by the leaflet scattering operation and took a physical action to help the human scum come to their senses. It is quite natural to take a strong military counter-action against the above-said operation. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities, however, are conniving at and shielding their operation, claiming that "there was no legal ground to halt it" and "it was a voluntary action" and "freedom of expression." 
					
					 This only brings to light the black-hearted intention of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the south Korean authorities behave as if they had nothing to do with the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation by human scum.
					
					 The DPRK will judge the prospect for the north-south relations from the south Korean authorities' stand on the leaflet scattering operation slated for today.

articles.title: Sexual Abuses Committed by S. Korean Puppet Military Bosses
articles.content:
Sexual Abuses Committed by S. Korean Puppet Military Bosses
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Sexual abuses by bosses of the south Korean puppet military have been disclosed one after another, stunning the public.
					 A lieut. colonel of a division of the army was suddenly arrested and put in custody for committing habitual sexual abuses, according to KBS of south Korea.
					
					 It was reported that he had perpetrated sexual abuses against his subordinate woman several times since September.
					
					 Some days ago, an army division commander was arrested for his sexual abuses, creating a great sensation in south Korea.

articles.title: Short Courses on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Held in Uganda
articles.content:
Short Courses on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Held in Uganda
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Short courses on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism were held at Makerere University and Kyambogo University of Uganda on Oct. 14 and 15.
					 They were attended by personages of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the office of the Ugandan prime minister and teachers and students of the universities.
					
					 Lectures were given on the essence of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and its scientific accuracy and tremendous vitality 
					
					 At the end of the courses the rector of Cultural Science and Political College of Makerere University said:
					
					 The course offered an opportunity to know well about the fact that H.E. Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of the preceding leaders as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and is steadily developing it.
					
					 We will deepen the study for Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and apply it to the reality of Uganda in the future.
					
					 We think this is the only way of smashing the imperialists' moves and keeping us alive.
					
					 The head of the Political Department of the university expressed determination to conduct activities for the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The dean of the Social Science and Political Faculty of Kyambogo University evinced the resolution to further deepen the study and dissemination of the Juche idea, noting that the DPRK has such great guiding idea as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated at the building of the Socialist Party of Romania on Oct. 15.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the party, was elected chairman of the memorial committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set the remembrance and memorial period from Oct. 20 to December 17 and organize various political and cultural events on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Nepalese Paper Introduces Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Nepalese Paper Introduces Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese paper Arpan on Oct. 10 carried an article titled "Birds flock to Kumsusan Palace of Sun."
					 The paper said:
					
					 There is the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il lie in state in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPR of Korea. There is the Arboretum around it.
					
					 The Arboretum has been built into a grand botanical museum and a general plant breeding farm representing the boundless reverence of all people for the peerless great men.
					
					 It forms a forest with trees of different species distributed in various parts of Korea, trees for urban greening and rare trees presented by different countries.
					
					 A European botanist praised the Arboretum as a world-class botanical museum associated with the sincerity and reverence of all people for the peerless great men, saying such arboretum can hardly be found in other places of the world.
					
					 Birds of various species flock to roost at the Arboretum.

articles.title: Nepalese Political Parties, Bodies Condemn U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
articles.content:
Nepalese Political Parties, Bodies Condemn U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Nepalese political parties and bodies issued a joint statement denouncing the U.S. and its followers for their anti-DPRK human rights campaign on Oct. 17.
					 They were the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Nepal Communist Party (United), Nepal Worker-Peasant Party, Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, National Press Club of Nepal, Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal and the Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 All countries including the DPRK have the right to preserve their sovereignty, dignity and independent development.
					
					 The U.S. is putting the UN under its control to abuse the UN for its selfish purposes and encroaching upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and the choice of its people.
					
					 The U.S. is also pulling up the DPRK over its "human rights issue".
					
					 We regard that it is an independent right of all countries to pursue human rights policy in line with their realistic requirements and the people's interests, not bound by "human rights level" defined by specific forces.
					
					 We demand the U.S. and its followers stop at once such unreasonable acts as interfering in the internal affairs of independent member nations by dint of fabricated "human rights issue" and "report on human rights", misleading  international public and tying to bring them for discussion even at the UN.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Observe WPK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Observe WPK Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special-write ups on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Nepalese paper Arpan on Oct. 10 carried an article titled "Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) and the WPK", illustrated with a portrait of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said that Kim Il Sung formed DIU on Oct. 17, 1926, a historic declaration heralding the new start of the Korean revolution and an epochal event that provided an occasion of drastic turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people. It introduced the final purpose and immediate tasks of DIU.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on Oct. 10 dedicated one whole page to an article titled "Ever-victorious WPK", illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It noted that the WPK which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people was founded on Oct. 10, 1945, introducing its guiding idea and unbreakable unity and cohesion. It went on:
					
					 The Korean people are full of faith and will to share destiny with the WPK led by First Secretary Kim Jong Un to the last. The party's invincibility is the truth proved by history.
					
					 The Indian paper Indian and World Event on Oct. 7 dedicated two pages to articles titled "Key to victory of socialist cause," "We serve the people!" and "WPK flag" under the caption "Nearly 70 years of leading people," illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on Oct. 13 in an article titled "On the occasion of 69th founding anniversary of WPK which has a history of nearly 70 years of leading people" praised the WPK for bringing world-startling miracles and innovations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con presidente de Consejo Nacional de Sudan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con presidente de Consejo Nacional de Sudan
Jartum, 24 de octubre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien realiza una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica del Sudan, departio el dia 24 en la sede del Consejo Nacional de Sudan con su presidente.
					En la ocasion el presidente del Consejo Nacional dijo que presta profunda atencion y envia calurosa felicitacion por los grandes exitos alcanzados por el pueblo coreano en la construccion de una potencia economica bajo la probada orientacion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Ese dia, el ofrecio un banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: RPDC frustrara campana de "DDHH" en su contra, declara CDN
articles.content:
RPDC frustrara campana de "DDHH" en su contra, declara CDN
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ya que resulto inefectiva su prolongada campana para aislar y aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pretextando el problema nuclear, Estados Unidos esta desesperado ahora para manchar la dignidad de la primera y desestabilizar su regimen socialista inventando el supuesto "problema de derechos humanos". 
					A finales de octubre cuando se acerca la Asamblea General de la ONU, se torna mas brutal la campana anti-RPDC en el tema de "DDHH". 
					
					Al respecto, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 25, bajo la autorizacion, una declaracion para exponer al interior y exterior la siguiente posicion de principios de la RPDC: 
					
					1. Puesto que llega al extremo la ofensiva de "DDHH" de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, avisamos oficialmente a EE.UU. que saldaremos las cuentas de generacion en generacion con las fuerzas involucradas utilizando todos los medios y metodos. 
					
					Nuestra sociedad es la humano-centrica que aprecia al hombre como ente mas valioso. 
					
					Por lo tanto, considera como fundamento de la politica y como inviolable politica estatal asegurar en el maximo nivel todos los derechos humanos. 
					
					Tal vez los politicos estadounidenses, incluso los presidentes sucesivos, no podran entender jamas que en este planeta existe una sociedad ideal como la RPDC, aunque se lo explique repetidamente. 
					
					EE.UU. es la sociedad incapaz donde su presidente negro no puede proteger los derechos humanos de la poblacion de la misma raza y el peor infierno para los DDHH en que el 99% de la poblacion viven como esclavos de cuno moderno del 1% aduenado de lo todo. 
					
					Es miserable que tal pais cuestione atrevidamente los verdaderos derechos humanos de la RPDC. 
					
					En esta oportunidad, aconsejamos con cortesia a Obama, Kerry y otros politicos norteamericanos, inventores del "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC, visiten con sus seguidores a nuestro pais para ver con sus propios ojos y aprender cuales son los verdaderos derechos humanos y cual es la sociedad humano-centrica. 
					
					Pero, este consejo no significa perdonar la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC lanzada por EE.UU. hasta la fecha. 
					
					Insatisfecho con sus tremendos crimenes cometidos contra el pueblo coreano durante mas de medio siglo, EE.UU. vuelve a recurrir a la campana de "DDHH" sin precedentes. Esta fechoria sera balanceada severamente generacion tras generacion. 
					
					2. Dado que la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. se expande como un complot para derrocar el digno sistema y el regimen de la RPDC, declaramos a EE.UU. y sus satelites las nuevas e intransigentes contramedidas por el estilo coreano para frustrarla. 
					
					La campana de "DDHH" es otra forma del acto agresivo mas abierto contra la soberania y el poder estatal de la RPDC. 
					
					Frente a ello, decidimos tomar las nuevas y fuertes contramedidas por el estilo coreano para eliminar los bastiones de los violadores de "DDHH". 
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias ya anunciaron a todo el mundo que esta firmado el plan de ataque total contra las bases de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico, que apuntan sus armas hacia la RPDC, y las ciudades principales estadounidenses donde se encuentran los maniacos de guerra. 
					
					No ocultamos que la declaracion de nuestras fuertes contramedidas se basa en las poderosas y perfectas fuerzas armadas nucleares y los medios de ataque sofisticados que seran desplegados en la tierra, el mar, el aire y en las aguas submarinas. 
					
					El mundo vera claramente como se ejecutaran nuestras fuertes contramedidas para destruir el bastion de la campana norteamericana de "DDHH" que sobrepasa su limite con el fin de acabar con la soberania y el poder estatal de la RPDC. 
					
					3. Nuestro ejercito y pueblo exhortan al mundo a frustrar estrictamente con la cooperacion antiyanqui de justicia y verdad la malsana cooperacion de agresion que persiguen EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites so pretexto del "problema de DDHH".
					
					La susodicha cooperacion antiyanqui es la justa para que todos los paises que consideran como vida la soberania y todos los pueblos amantes de la paz se levanten para desmembrar a los imperialistas yanquis por doquier del  mundo.
					
					Desarrollaremos con audacia la lucha justa contra los yanquis, enemigo jurado, hombro con hombro con todos los paises que aspiran a la justicia y la verdad.
					
					La cooperacion antiyanqui se extendera al combate de vida o muerte para aniquilar el hombre a la bestia, la justicia a la injusticia y la verdad a la falsedad.
					
					En la realizacion de la cooperacion antiyanqui en escala mundial las fuerzas armadas nucleares y el disuasivo politico y militar poseidos por la RPDC pondran de pleno manifiesto su poderio inimaginable.
					
					La campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. fracasara sin falta porque es inventada por los agonizantes carentes de comprension elemental sobre su contraparte y basada en la logica hostil bandidesca y egotista.

articles.title: Inaugurada Casa de Reposo para Cientificos Yonphung
articles.content:
Inaugurada Casa de Reposo para Cientificos Yonphung
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se ha levantado excelentemente a la orilla del pintoresco lago Yonphung la Casa de Reposo para Cientificos que consta del pabellon de reposo, el centro de servicio general, la cancha multifuncional al aire libre, las piscinas bajo techo y al aire libre, la sala de videos, el sitio de pesca y otros edificios de nuevas formas y contenidos.
					La Casa de Reposo fue construida en el nivel mundial por la benevolencia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 24 la ceremonia de inauguracion con la participacion de Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros, los funcionarios de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, cientificos, constructores militares y empleados de la Casa de Reposo. 
					
					La palabra de inauguracion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El orador dijo que la inauguracion de la Casa de Reposo para Cientificos Yonphung, seguido del levantamiento magnifico de la zona de viviendas de cientificos Wisong, es la orgullosa realidad preparada por la idea del Mariscal de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas y a los talentosos. 
					
					En todos los campos de construccion de un Estado prospero se presentan muchas obras de construccion, pero, el Mariscal hizo levantar con prioridad la casa de reposo para cientificos, subrayo y llamo a todos a levantarse como un solo hombre para convertir la patria en el paraiso del pueblo y potencia que prospera con las ciencias y tecnicas en apoyo a la idea del PTC de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas y a los talentosos. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes recorrieron la casa de reposo.
